content: ~ christmas cable scarf ~ simple & classy scarf ideal for christmas gifts items needed worsted weight yarn to create desired length size us7 needles cable needle key/techniques used co = cast on long tail k = knit p = purl cb6 = place three stitches on cable needle and put needle to back of work ignore those stitches and knit the next 3 stitches on the original needle then knit the stitches on the cable needle cf6 = place three stitches on cable needle and put needle to front of work knit the next 3 stitches on the original needle then knit the stitches on the cable needle rs = right side ws = wrong side pattern co 40 stitches k 7 row to create garter stitch border then begin pattern row 1 rs k4 p2 k6 p2 k1 p1 k8 p1 k1 p2 k6 p2 k4 row 2 ws and all even row k3 p1 k2 p6 k2 p1 k1 p8 k1 p1 k2 p6 k2 p1 k3 row 3 same as row 1 row 5 same as row 1 row 7 k4 p2 cb6 p2 k1 p1 k8 p1 k1 p2 cf6 p2 k4 row 8 same as row 2 repeat row 1-8 until desired length k 7 row for garter stitch border bind off and weave ends in
